aircraft.value: Eagle Vision-9 - AC-4293-595 at Sector West Station

defect_observed.value: Oil consumption rate increase. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 02/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 03/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 06/05/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 06/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 12/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

Part - III: (Defect Details)

b) Defect Observed: Oil consumption rate increase. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component.
Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
